name: Mindflash
tag_list: elearning, learning-management-system, training-tools, learning-management-systems, online-quiz-maker, e-learning-software, online-test-maker, elearning-software, online-testing-software, online-learning-software
overview: Mindflash is an online LMS that lets you create courses, manage trainees, and track the results. Just upload your PowerPoint, Word, PDF, or videos and Mindflash converts them into a professional-looking Web-based course. Easily add quizzes, invite trainees and track results with automated tools. Mindflash is the perfect solution for companies or departments who need to provide compliance, sales or product training to 500 - 5,000 people. Mindflash plans start with 30 days of FREE unlimited use!
